mapper.insert: insert into History(id, sendUser, receiveUser, time, content) values(#{id}, #{sendUser}, #{receiveUser}, #{time}, #{content})
mapper.select: select h.id id, h.sendUser sendUser, h.receiveUser receiveUser, h.time time, h.content content, u.img img from History h inner join User u on h.sendUser = u.username where (h.sendUser = #{username} and h.receiveUser = #{usernameOther}) or (h.receiveUser = #{username} and h.sendUser = #{usernameOther}) order by h.time asc
